title: Welcome to SeemsRelevant!
preview: Welcome, I'm Chris Woodward, an aspiring professional coder/web developer from Redding, California and currently living in Spokane, Washington. The motives behind creating this site were simple: to document solutions to problems that I have encountered during the web development process and to interact and network with other developers, and to post and discuss other things that I find intersting or useful. Since personal blogs and articles have been a huge source of realizations in the process of learning about coding and development, I figured that I would offer my two cents, and hopefully give someone the creative insight that they were searching for. Take a look around, and hopefully you can find something useful that will help you on your next project.

title: Coming Soon: Code this Website
preview: One of the benefits of creating this site was that it has forced me to learn the process of WebApp development from the ground up, from ideation to deployment. I am going to document this process as I experienced it through a series of articles in the Projects section. To start off, it will be a purely front-end project, and will utilize AngularJS. If you've been wondering about AngularJS or Single-Page Applications in general, check it out!

title: Under Construction: Sorting Algorithm Visualization
preview: My next project involves something that I've been wanting to explore for awhile, and that is algorithm visualization. My eventual goal is to create an interactive and informative representation of sorting and other algorithms that will be useful (or at least interesting) even if one doesn't have any idea what the algorithms do, while also offering the expert a new way of looking at the algorithms through observing them in the visual domain.

title: Congratulations Trevor!
preview: I would like to say congratulations to my little brother, Trevor Woodward, who graduated from the United States Air Force Academy last week with a Bachelors of Science in Economics. Not only that, but he also graduated well within the top third of his class. Congrats Trevor!

title: Check out the new photography section
preview: If you like photography, then check out the new photography section, where you can browse photos i've taken, and soon I would like to try and support a collaborative environment for sharing photos/ideas.

title: Displaying Code Snippets on the Web
preview: I was trying to figure out how I was going to implement displaying code snippets on SeemsRelevant, and I stumbled across this awesome little (tiny) JavaScript library (which is apparently also used by a few pretty awesome websites you've probably heard of such as Scotch.io, Smashing Magazine, CSS-Tricks and the Mozilla Developer Network).
